testcase.classname: US_003 Registration page should restrict password usage to a secure
testcase.name: TC_001 There should be at least one lowercase char for stronger password and
testcase.system-out: When User goes to "GmiBank_url" Homepage....................................passed And User clicks the "Register" from dropdown menu...........................passed And User scrolls down the page..............................................passed And User enter to password text box five lowercase "invalid_password1" and presses tab.passed Then User sees invalid password message "password_should_contain_at_least" und.passed Then User sees on the password strenght bar red colour......................passed
